name: Carrie Animals
description:
Basic Premise:
Carrie Animals is a puzzle platformer where you must get all the animals to the goal (marked by a red flag). 

Carrie is able to absorb a single power from an animal. She can only have one power at a time.  In addition, she can carry one animal on her head. 

You will have to experiment with the different animals to see how their powers can be utilized. If you get stuck, you can reset the level (see controls). 

Keyboard Controls:
Z - Absorb  / pick up Animal
SPACE - Jump
R - Reset Level

XBOX Gamepad Controls:
X - Absorb  / pick up Animal
A - Jump
Right Bumper + Left Bumper + Start - Reset Level

Game programming, graphics, music and sound effect by Matthew Willox.
